sentence: Engagement can mean either planning to marry or initiating combat. coincidence?
explanation: Engagement refers to a promise to marry someone. Engagement can also denote combat initiation in military terms.
first_new_sentence: Their engagement was announced during the holiday dinner.
second_new_sentence: The soldiers prepared for engagement with the enemy at dawn.

sentence: This is the only joke from the list that meets all specified requirements, with a single word having two distinct meanings in a non-homophonic context. If you have more jokes or need additional examples, feel free to provide them!
